badges.name: Mintpad Conqueror Badge
badges.description: The Scroll Conqueror Badge is Mintpad's first badge, commemorating the collaboration between Mintpad and HypoDrop. mint the NFT and claim the Badge.

badges.name: HypoDrop OG Badge
badges.description: This badge, issued by HypoDrop, recognizes users who have minted an HypoDrop OG NFT on the Scroll network. The Holders of the HypoDrop OG badge can unlock special rewards and access.

badges.name: Turtle Badge
badges.description: This badge is awarded to members of the Turtle Club.

badges.name: Well Done Owl
badges.description: Here's a badge to show your loyalty to the Hoot team, for all those who keep their owls staked in partnership with ZProtocol

badges.name: Meta Map Pathfinder Badge
badges.description: This badge is awarded to owners of the Meta Map Pathfinder NFT collection, recognizing their contribution to charting new territories in the digital landscape. Holders of this badge gain access to exclusive rewards for participating in this events.

badges.name: Bubble Land
badges.description: Those who mint official bubble land NFTs can claim this badge. The Badge has 6 levels, and the higher levels can be unlocked with more mints

badges.name: OG Duck Badge
badges.description: Owning this badge proves that you're a real OG of Ducks Community!

badges.name: Lazy Art Legacy Badge
badges.description: Own a Lazy Art Legacy.Mint LazyArtLegacy on our own NFT marketplace, LazyArtHub https://lazyarthub.com/drops/

badges.name: Vovo Holder
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who stake at least 1 Vovo at the time it is given.

badges.name: Hippo Swap Badge
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who have swapped a minimum of $100 on HippoSwap.

badges.name: Comet InstantGas Badge
badges.description: Complete an “Instant Gas” transaction from Scroll to any supported chain.

badges.name: Rho Markets x Toaster Collab Badge
badges.description: Deposit $300+ into Rho Markets through Toaster Finance in a single transaction to unlock the collab badge!

badges.name: Galaxy Ninja
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who swapped a minimum of $100 on Scroll using Galaxy Exchange.

badges.name: Varonve Minter
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who minted Varonve NFT during the mint

badges.name: Z Protocol Pioneer
badges.description: This badge recognizes early Scroll session adopters who were among the first to support Z Protocol - Scroll Sessions by minting both the ZP Session ZERO and ZP Session ONE NFTs. These are unique and limited-time NFTs. They are still available until Scroll ends these sessions.

badges.name: Varonve Holder
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who hold at least 1 Varonve at the time it is given.

badges.name: Meta Map Expeditor Badge
badges.description: This badge is awarded to users who have minted at least 5 country through MetaMap.

badges.name: Meta Map Scout Badge
badges.description: This badge is awarded to users who have minted at least 1 country through MetaMap.

badges.name: Diamond Hands Owl
badges.description: For those who truly believe in Scrowls! Hold at least 1 Scrowl NFT in your wallet for 14 days to earn this exclusive badge. Show the world your commitment! Starting count from 09/12/2024 to 09/26/2024

badges.name: Ducks Club Badge
badges.description: Own this badge to prove that you're a member of the Ducks Community, this badge is a lifetime proof that you own or you owned a duck NFT!

badges.name: Comet Bridger Badge Pre
badges.description: Bridging 3 Txns to Scroll via Comet.

badges.name: Comet Bridger Badge
badges.description: Bridging 1 Txn to Scroll via Comet.

badges.name: Matcha Scroll Trader
badges.description: This badge design is a visualization of the routing magic we perform to get you the best price. Get yours by trading a minimum of 4 trades on Matcha on Scroll. Go explore what onchain trading on Scroll can be!

badges.name: Eisen Tier 1 : Pioneer
badges.description: Achieve the prestigious Pioneer Badge by executing swaps totaling over $5,000 in value on Scroll via Eisen. This badge marks you as a trailblazer in the Eisen ecosystem, recognizing your advanced level of participation and influence.

badges.name: Eisen Tier 2 : Navigator
badges.description: This badge represents that the user completed swaps on Scroll via Eisen, totaling over $3,000 in value. As a Navigator, you demonstrate your proficiency in leveraging the Eisen platform to achieve your financial goals.

badges.name: NFTs2Me Creator Badge
badges.description: Badge awarded for creating at least one NFT Collection on Scroll using https://NFTs2Me.com

badges.name: NFTs2Me Gold Pin Badge
badges.description: This badge is awarded to owners of NFTs2Me Gold Supporter Pin. Mint yours at https://nfts2me.com/scroll-badges/

badges.name: NFTs2Me Silver Pin Badge
badges.description: This badge is awarded to owners of NFTs2Me Silver Supporter Pin. Mint yours at https://nfts2me.com/scroll-badges/

badges.name: NFTs2Me Bronze Pin Badge
badges.description: This badge is awarded to owners of NFTs2Me Bronze Supporter Pin. Mint yours at https://nfts2me.com/scroll-badges/

badges.name: Interport Space Cadet
badges.description: This badge is awarded for completing 3+ cross-chain transactions through swaps, bridging, or gas transfers to/from the Scroll chain, marking your first bold steps into the decentralized universe.

badges.name: HypoDrop Keeper Badge
badges.description: This badge, issued by HypoDrop, recognizes users who have minted an exclusive NFT on the Scroll network. It serves as a symbol of loyalty within our Social-Fi ecosystem, offering unique utilities and benefits. Holders of this badge can earn rewards from promoted projects and gain additional perks by inviting new users or engaging with partnered initiatives.

badges.name: Early Bird Owl
badges.description: A special badge for those who minted during our initial sale. You were there from the beginning, and this badge commemorates your early support!

badges.name: Deferred transaction service from RubyScore on Scroll
badges.description: Deposit 0.001 ETH into the deferred transaction service on RubyScore in Scroll and earn a Scroll Canvas badge. Access code to the deferred transaction service —Scroll—

badges.name: Human Squad with Rhino
badges.description: This badge celebrates the collaboration with Rhino on the Scroll network. To qualify, you need to complete two tasks: 1. Hold a .scroll name at https://scroll.xname.app ; 2. Bridge $10 minimum from any network to scroll at https://app.rhino.fi/bridge?token=ETH&chainOut=SCROLL .

badges.name: Vessel LP
badges.description: Vessel LP is for Scrollers whose total value of LP positions on Vessel exceeds $200.

badges.name: Vessel Voyager
badges.description: Vessel Voyager badge is for Scrollers whose total value of deposited assets on Vessel exceeds $50.

badges.name: Vessel Explorer
badges.description: Vessel Explorer badge is for Scrollers who have earned more than 10000 Vessel Mileage through liquidity provision.

badges.name: OmniHub Profile Badge
badges.description: The Omnihub Profile badge is for users who have registered their unique .omnihub domain name on the Scroll network.

badges.name: oooo Explorer
Across x Toaster Collab Badge
badges.description: Celebrate the first collaboration badge on Scroll Canvas! Bridge over $300 to Scroll through Across on Toaster Finance in a single transaction. Don't forget, this transaction must be made on www.toaster.finance to qualify. Join in and be part of this special milestone!

badges.name: Invite Badge
badges.description: Register your unique invite code on Scroll! Earn this badge and points from your friends and anyone they invite!

badges.name: Rookie Badge
badges.description: Mint your avatar on Scroll to earn this badge and 2,000 points! Your avatar is your gateway into the game!

badges.name: Benmo Community Badge
badges.description: Users who use the exclusive Benmo invitation code at the Stakestone Carnival can qualify to mint the Badge.

badges.name: Scroll C2 1stJourney
badges.description: By being among the first to experience a voxel-style world scene UGC by users in C².WORLD, users will receive a badge called "Scroll C2 1stJourney." After C².WORLD launches, holders of this NFT will be granted special SCP2Earn rewards, further enhancing their interaction and earning experience on the platform.

badges.name: Scroll C2 1stUGCExp
badges.description: When a user experiences the "My Tank" game created by a C².WORLD user for the first time, they will receive a badge called "Scroll C2 1stUGCExp." After C².WORLD launches, holders of this badge will be granted special SCP2Earn rewards, further enhancing their earning experience on the platform.

badges.name: Aetherbind Archmage
badges.description: Elves, halflings, and humans from across the seven realms travel dangerous paths just to learn from you. You have truly mastered the art of magic. You are one with the weave. You provided $1,000+ in liquidity on Scribe and held it for 30+ days. You are dangerous. Liquidity must still be present to earn this badge.

badges.name: Wardseal Wizard
badges.description: Through years of honing the arcane arts, and meditative-like concentration, I provided $100+ of liquidity to Scribe and cast a wardseal, holding it for at least 30 days. Only those with liquidity intact at minting can claim this badge.

badges.name: Lazy Sloth Badge
badges.description: Badge awarded for minting a Lazy Sloth NFT on Scroll.

badges.name: Scroll C2 Living
badges.description: When a user purchases two Genesis NFTs from the C².WORLD Marketplace, they will receive a unique badge called "Living." Holding this badge not only allows users to showcase their distinctive identity but also grants them a mysterious blind box that accelerates production earnings, further enhancing their economic benefits and experience in the virtual world.

badges.name: oooo Pioneer
badges.description:
The oooo Pioneer Badge is awarded to users who have followed oooo official twitter and completed 1 bridge transaction to Scroll on the oooo Bridge; users can earn 10 Goooo after completing the below tasks:

Step 1: Complete follow X & discord tasks and earn 2 Goooo: https://bridge.oooo.money/goooo
Step 2: Bridge any token to Scroll: https://bridge.oooo.money/?token=ETH&from=bsc&to=scroll, claim your 8 Goooo at: https://bridge.oooo.money/goooo

badges.name: Interport Stellar Bridger
badges.description: This badge is awarded for successfully bridging any supported assets (except USDT/USDC/USDB) to the Scroll chain, recognizing your journey through Interport’s cosmic pathways.

badges.name: Interport Gas Booster
badges.description: This badge is awarded for refilling gas on the Scroll chain via Interport’s Gas Transfer tool.

badges.name: Scroll Sloth Badge
badges.description: This badge is created specifically for users who hold Scroll Sloth NFTs on the Scroll network.

badges.name: zkSync Bridger
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who made cross-chain swap from zkSync to Scroll. Explore more and mint all 14 badges in Symbiosis App: https://app.symbiosis.finance/scroll-badges

badges.name: Blast Bridger
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who made cross-chain swap from Blast to Scroll. Explore and mint all 14 badges in Symbiosis App: https://app.symbiosis.finance/scroll-badges

badges.name: Scroll Cross-chain Professional
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who bridged a minimum of $100 through Symbiosis to Scroll. Explore and mint all 14 badges in Symbiosis App: https://app.symbiosis.finance/scroll-badges

badges.name: Symbiosis Pro Swapper
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who made a minimum of $100 on-chain swap on Scroll (E.g. wrsETH to ETH). Explore all 14 badges in Symbiosis App: https://app.symbiosis.finance/scroll-badges

badges.name: Galaxy Navigator
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who bridged a minimum of $100 to Scroll

badges.name: Scroll MasterBridger
badges.description: Scroll MasterBridger is dedicated for everyone who completed at least 2 bridges from any EVM network to Scroll Network on RetroBridge

badges.name: Scroll MasterSwapper
badges.description: Scroll MasterSwapper is dedicated for everyone who completed at least 2 swaps from any EVM network to Scroll Network on RetroBridge

badges.name: MemeBridge Bridger Premium
badges.description: Earn this badge for complete three bridge to Scroll Network via MemeBridge.

badges.name: Scroll C2 Portal
badges.description: Users who complete quests and mint relevant NFTS on the C².WORLD platform will receive a Scroll C2 Portal badge.  Holders of this badge not only highlight the unique commemorative value and exclusive honor of the first citizens, but also receive a super value reward when the blind box NFT is opened.

badges.name: iZiSwap Liquidity Provider Badge
badges.description: The iZiSwap Liquidity Provider Badge is a specially designed NFT program that recognizes users who provide liquidity on Scroll with a total liquidity value of over 50 USD.

badges.name: iZiSwap Swapper Badge
badges.description: The iZiSwap Swapper Badge is a specially designed NFT program that recognizes iZiSwap traders on Scroll who have achieved a trading volume of over 50 USD.

badges.name: Loop Aficionado Scroll
badges.description: Loop Aficionado Badge on Scroll for Points Program

badges.name: GNFT Staker Badge
badges.description: The purpose of this badge is to recognize the GNFT Staker contributors

badges.name: GBadge
badges.description: The purpose of this badge is to recognize early backers of Grade NFT

badges.name: ZNS Gift Card Collector
badges.description: Unlock this badge by minting ZNS credits. Use your credits for free domain minting. Start collecting now! Mint Credits — worth 3+ USDT on Scroll.

badges.name: MemeBridge Bridger
badges.description: Earn this badge for complete one bridge to Scroll Network via MemeBridge.

badges.name: Gold Scroll Bridger Badge
badges.description: Pilots who complete six bridges from/to Scroll Network via Orbiter Finance can claim the Badge.

badges.name: XY Bridge Badge
badges.description: Earn this badge by Bridging at least 25 USD Value to Scroll

badges.name: XY Liquidity Badge
badges.description: Earn this badge by providing at least 100 USD Value on Scroll

badges.name: Interport Cross-Chain Swapper
badges.description: This badge is awarded for completing a cross-chain swap from any supported chain to Scroll, recognizing your voyage through Interport’s galaxy.

badges.name: Rho Keeper
badges.description: The Rho Keeper badge is awarded to users who hold Rho Pets. To unlock a Rho Pet, simply supply at least $150 of any asset on Rho Markets.

badges.name: Galaxy Rover
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who bridged a minimum of $10 to Scroll

badges.name: MiniBridge Champion
badges.description: MiniBridge Gold badge is for users who have made 10 bridge transactions to scroll on MiniBridge.

badges.name: Unique Humanity Score
badges.description: This badge is for Scrollers who have a Passport score above 20, and have minted an onchain attestation to the Scroll network. Minting this badge informs everyone in the Scroll ecosystem that you're a real human!

badges.name: Diamond Scroll Bridger Badge
badges.description: Pilots who become Top 100 in Scroll Trading Frenzy can claim the Badge

badges.name: MiniBridge Silver
badges.description: MiniBridge Silver badge is for users who have made 5 bridge transactions to scroll on MiniBridge.

badges.name: RubyScore ranking on Scroll
badges.description: Increase your on-chain Scroll ranking by collecting NFT boxes on RubyScore and earn a Scroll Canvas badge

badges.name: MiniBridge Beginner
badges.description: MiniBridge Bronze badge is for users who have made 1 bridge transaction to scroll on MiniBridge.

badges.name: SyncSwap Stargazer
badges.description: This badge is rewarded to early SyncSwap users on Scroll who have one or more liquidity position over $1000.

badges.name: Conft Scroll Box
badges.description: Conft Scroll Box Badge is for the users that minted special “Cosmic Surprise” collection on Scroll. Users with this badge secure eligibility for future rewards from Conft.

badges.name: VenisterX Badge
badges.description: Own 5 champions in the Venverse.

badges.name: Grade POP Badge
badges.description: The purpose of this badge is to recognize the Grade POP contributors

badges.name: GNFT Whale
badges.description: The purpose of this badge is to recognize the GNFT Whale

badges.name: Human Squad with DMAIL
badges.description: This badge celebrates the collaboration with DMAIL on the Scroll network. To qualify, you need to complete two tasks: 1. Hold a .scroll name at https://scroll.xname.app ; 2. Send an email on the Scroll network using https://mail.dmail.ai/compose .

badges.name: Liquidity Loremaster
badges.description: By cultivating the arcane practices of DeFi I provided more than $1,000 of liquidity on Scribe DEX (and earned points in the process). Now watch me conjure lightning ⚡️

badges.name: Swapping Sorcerer
badges.description: I swapped more than $500 on Scribe DEX (and earned points in the process). Now watch me conjure fire 🔥

badges.name: Eisen Beginner
badges.description: This badge is awarded to users who have completed a swap of more than $10 in value on Scroll via Eisen. Start your journey on Eisen with this beginner-level badge and showcase your first step into the world of decentralized finance.

badges.name: Venister Badge
badges.description: Own aa champion in the Venverse.

badges.name: OmniHub Gold Badge
badges.description: This badge is awarded to users who have created five NFT collections through OmniHub on the Scroll network.

badges.name: OmniHub Guardian Badge
badges.description: This badge is awarded to users who own the OmniHub Guardian NFT collection on the Scroll network.

badges.name: NURI-ETH LPer
badges.description: This badge demonstrates a user has minted 0.1 or more NURI-ETH LP tokens at the current point in time

badges.name: Nuri Locker Badge (100)
badges.description: This badge represents ownership of a veNURI lock with more than 100 NURI and a locktime above 3 years

badges.name: SyncSwap Lucky Trader
badges.description: This badge is rewarded to early SyncSwap users on Scroll who have made one or more swaps for more than $450.

badges.name: Landing on Scroll
badges.description: Transfer 1 Bunny NFT to Scroll via Cross-chain Adventure.

badges.name: Hippo Realm Holder
badges.description: This badge is designed for users holding Hippo Realm NFTs on Scroll.

badges.name: Toaster OG Badge
badges.description: Congratulations, you've achieved OG status on Toaster! This badge is awarded for collecting 300 Butters. Holders of this badge may enjoy exclusive benefits in the future.

badges.name: Toaster GM Badge
badges.description: GM from Toaster! Users who deposit or swap on Scroll more than $300 will receive this badge.

badges.name: Toaster Airdrop Badge
badges.description: Connect your X (Twitter) account on our website and follow @toasterfinance to receive this badge. You can link your Twitter account here: https://www.toaster.finance/butter. (Art by @yeju_jeong_)

badges.name: Smilecobra Genleap badge
badges.description: Genleap is the first AAA MMORPG game developed by Smilecobra Studio. Users who complete tasks on Smilecobra and mint SMC HALO NFT will receive the Smilecobra Genleap badge. Holders of this badge will be eligible for potential airdrop rewards from the SMC

badges.name: Conft 2024 Badge
badges.description: Conft 2024 Badge is for users with a unique ‘.s’ domain name registered on Scroll via Conft’s Name Service. Users with this badge secure eligibility for future rewards from Conft.

badges.name: Fanaticism Scroll Bridger Badge
badges.description: Owltors who complete five bridges to Scroll Network via Owlto Finance can claim the Badge.

badges.name: Loyal Scroll Bridger Badge
badges.description: Owltors who complete three bridges to Scroll Network via Owlto Finance can claim the Badge.

badges.name: Entry Scroll Bridger Badge
badges.description: Owltors who complete one bridge to Scroll Network via Owlto Finance can claim the Badge.

badges.name: Nuri Locker Badge (10)
badges.description: This badge represents ownership of a veNURI lock with at least 10 NURI and a locktime above 3 years

badges.name: Explorer Certificate
badges.description: This certificate is designed for people who have sent Bunny to Chain explore on Scroll at least once.

badges.name: Pencils SOUL Drops
badges.description: The Pencils SOUL Drops program is linked to users’ verified social identities. Holders earn Pencil Points and rewards from Scroll’s ecosystem partners.

badges.name: Scroll Domain Master Badge 🎖️
badges.description: Achieve the Scroll Domain Master Badge by minting 5 domains on Scroll. This prestigious badge marks you as a master in the domain space! Mint your domains now: https://zns.bio/

badges.name: Scroll Overlord
badges.description: Participated in at least one Land War season on scroll.

badges.name: Scroll Explorer
badges.description: Own at least 1 piece of land on Scroll, either through purchase or adventure reward.

badges.name: Smilecobra Genesis Badge
badges.description: Users who complete quest on the SmileCobra platform and mint the SMC HONOUR NFT will receive the SmileCobra Genesis Badge. Holders of this badge will enjoy potential airdrop incentives across the entire platform in the future.

badges.name: Scroll RetroBridger
badges.description: RetroBridger Badge on Scroll L2 dedicated for everyone who bridged from 0.05 ETH or $150 worth of stables through RetroBridge to Scroll Network

badges.name: Proof of Humanity Badge
badges.description: Demonstrate your human agency exclusively through your blockchain activities, without the necessity for validation from a centralized entity. The issuance of this badge serves as a testament to your authenticity as a human participant within the Scroll ecosystem.

badges.name: OmniHub Badge
badges.description: This badge is designed for users who created a minimum one NFT collection through OmniHub to Scroll network.

badges.name: Scroll Booster
badges.description: This badge is for holders with .scroll names. Secure your .scroll identity at https://xname.app .

badges.name: XHS Holder
badges.description: This badge is for holders with an XHS (Adaptive Humanity Score) above 0. Prove your humanity at https://xname.app/xhs .

badges.name: Scroll Reputation Attestation
badges.description: Trusta MEDIA Score on Scroll Network ranging from 20 to 100 is eligible for minting a Reputation Attestation Badge on Scroll. Craft this badge to affirm your status as an engaged participant in the realm of Scroll!

badges.name: ZNS Badge
badges.description: Earn this badge for minting a ZNS Domain on Scroll

badges.name: Scroller Agent Badge
badges.description: Earn this badge by bridging with your Scroller NFT from ETH Mainnet to Scroll.

badges.name: Pencil P Badge
badges.description: Pencils P Badge is rewarded to users who actively participated in Pencils Protocol multi-seasons campaign, with staking more than 0.1 ETH equivalent assets into Scroll ecosystem

badges.name: Pencil S Badge
badges.description: Pencils S Badge is rewarded to users who actively participated in Pencils Protocol multi-seasons campaign, with staking more than 0.5 ETH equivalent assets into Scroll ecosystem

badges.name: Unrevealed
badges.description: Unrevealed scrolly badge.

badges.name: Zebra
badges.description: Users who participate in Scroll Canvas and complete tasks will receive Zebra's 'zebra' badge. Users with this badge will enjoy Zebra's early benefits in the future.

badges.name: Ambient Yeet
badges.description: Yeet badge is for users who are providing a sizable amount of liquidity in a single position. You will be rewarded accordingly to the size, but for now, enjoy having a differently colored croc! (Art by @ShizzyAizawa)

badges.name: Ambient Filloor
badges.description: Filloor badge is for users who have one or more filled limit orders on Ambient Finance valued over $500. (Art by @ShizzyAizawa)

badges.name: Ambient Providoor
badges.description: Providoor badge is for users who have made one or more single LP positions on Ambient Finance valued over $1000. (Art by @ShizzyAizawa)

badges.name: Ambient Swapooor
badges.description: Swapooor badge is for users who have made one or more single swaps on Ambient for $500. (Art by @ShizzyAizawa)

badges.name: Ethereum Year Badge
badges.description: Check out the Ethereum Year Badge! It's like a digital trophy that shows off the year your wallet made its debut on Ethereum. It's a little present from Scroll to celebrate all the cool stuff you've done in the Ethereum ecosystem.

badges.name: Scroll Origins NFT
badges.description:
[Scroll Origins](https://scroll.io/blog/scroll-origins-nft) is a [specially designed NFT](https://scroll.io/blog/designing-scroll-origins)
program to celebrate alongside early developers building on Scroll within 60 days of Genesis Block (Before December 9, 2023 10:59PM GMT)
